SELECT sm.*, wt.ticket_code, wt.type,
si.name as staffName, si.images as staffImages, di.dept_name, poi.name as positionName,
wt.wtwork_content, wt.wtlocation, wt.wtstart_time, wt.wtend_time, wt.wtrisk_level, wt.wtai_audit_score, wt.wtai_audit_suggestion FROM safety_measures sm left join work_ticket wt on (wt.id = sm.permit_id) LEFT JOIN staff_info si ON (si.id = wt.applicant_id) left join dept_info di on (di.id = si.dept_id) left join position_info poi on (poi.id = si.position_id) WHERE 1 = 1
AND si.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{workMeasure.staffName}, '%')
AND wt.type LIKE CONCAT('%', #{workMeasure.type}, '%')
AND wt.risk_level = #{workMeasure.riskLevel}
ORDER BY sm.confirm_time
